author: rhuijben
msg: Store commit paths as normal relpaths instead of as uri encoded partial uris.
Its easier to decode once, then to decode everywhere.
* subversion/include/svn_client.h
(svn_client_commit_item3_t): Add session_relpath.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(svn_client__condense_commit_items): Store decoded relative path in
session_relpath instead of undecoded in url.
(do_item_commit): Hash on decoded path.
(svn_client__do_commit): Don't decode paths.
* subversion/libsvn_client/ra.c
(get_wc_prop,
push_wc_prop): Don't uri decode for every item in the loop. Just assume
item->path is an abspath.

author: cdouglas
msg: MAPREDUCE-2468. Add metrics for NM Shuffle.
Contributed by Luke Lu

author: rajith
msg: QPID-3233
If the underlying AMQP session gets closed, the JMS session is now notified along with details that caused the session closure.
The JMS Session will throw an exception (with an error code and details) when a user accesses the closed session.

author: zwoop
msg: TS-757 Change TSNetAccept() API to take an option for enabling (and
number of) accept threads. Also have it take a protocol "domain"
argument, to be consistent with the underlying internal APIs.

author: maartenc
msg: Online ivy.xsd hadn't been updated when Ivy 2.2.0 was released (IVY-1278)
